TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted. You are given a virus condenamed "aini". honestly there's not much corrupting to be done here

I wish for perfection.

Granted: 99.8% of the world's population listen to heavy metal instead of pop music.

I wish for a stinky pile of poo.

Granted. It's your job to clean it now.

I wish for less stupid people requiring my attention at work.

And btw...

Granted: 99.8% of the world's population listen to heavy metal instead of pop music.

That's not corrupted at all. In fact, it IS perfection

Granted now all the geniuses in the world require work from you

I wish to know who green iron crown was and what he did.

Granted. Now you are his mother, crying for him at his funeral when he stepped a mine.

I want a puppy.

Edited April 9, 2015 by Dman979
ninja

Granted. The puppy, however, requires your attention day and night, and you can't leave him alone.

He also likes to eat your food.

I wish to be able to send Kerbals to Jool.

Granted. They burn in atmosphere.

I wish for a pet bird.

Granted I eat it

i wish for ninjas stop skipping because I ninjaed them

Granted. You get an apple, as your with made no sense.

I wish my Oberth burns weren't so tedious. 1 minute burn time for 20 m/s... Try living with that.

Granted! Elevator music now plays whenever you do these long burns to reduce the tedium.

I wish to have more time available, so I can get more stuff done.

Granted. You get 14 years of free time, but you're now on a space station that orbits tightly around a large black hole. As a result, you use up all your time within 4 hours.

I wish for a street-legal car that's a scaled-down Ranger from Interstellar.

Granted. It's scaled down to the size of a matchbox car.

I wish, I wish, upon a star, to travel, reach, and land on mars. (Safely, of course )

Granted! The store's owner is mad at you for stepping on his chocolate bar.

I wish for better guitar playing skills.

Granted. Shortly after you lose your fingers to frostbite.

I wish for a free, healthy, delicious lunch made for me every day.

Granted. You also get free, delicious and healthy dinners, breakfasts and snacks! The meals are all the same, however, and you get tired of it pretty quickly. Not even a chance of getting anything else.

I wish to speak more languages.

Granted: u now can speak girrafe, owl, and penguin.

I wish to know all of the European human languages.

Granted. Your knowledge is considerable, but useless, as everyone starts to speak Chinese.

I wish to have an owl, giraffe and a penguin to have a nice conversation with.

Granted, but they only speak in reverse Polish.

I wish for Time Warner Cable to increase their maximum bandwidth by installing more cables.

Granted, the cables go through your ears into that large hollow space.

I wish for my vision to get better.

Granted, but you're deaf, and on fire.

I wish for more oxygen in the atmosphere.

oxygen can kill people.

I wish to explode all the fish.

This wish doesn't even need corrupting. All the fish explode. A major food source is lost, the ocean pretty much dies, and the whole world starts shutting down. Nice one.

I wish I didn't have to wish this wish.

Too bad.

I wish I could land on the sun with no consequences.

Too bad.

I wish I could land on the sun with no consequences.

You land and are instantly vaporized. Thankfully the sun suffered no consequences.

I wish I had a computer to play KSP on.

Granted, but KSP lags to all holy h***.

I wish my computer was better.
